item.title: Leanstore: High Performance Low-Overhead Buffer Pool

item.title: Tiered Storage via 2-Tree
item.description: Split a data-structure into two: a memory-optimized ’top’-tree and a disk optimized ‘bottom’-tree. Implement a lightweight migration protocol for hot records to move up and cold records down.

item.title: Pointer Swizzling Buffer Pools
item.description: Switching pointers as the data pointed to moves to and fro memory and secondary storage

item.title: Compacting Transactional Data in HyPer
item.description: Keep hot tuples uncompressed, organize cold data into chunks of columns then use lightweight compression, handle both OLTP and OLAP workloads

item.title: Virtual Memory Hot/Cold Data Re-organization for OLTP
item.description: Hot/Cold aware memory allocation with locking of the hot region to physical memory and letting the OS swap out cold LRU pages as needed.

item.description: Hint, it’s based on exponential smoothing

item.title: Anti-Caching
item.description: Track hot/cold data at tuple-level granularity. Evict LRU cold data in blocks.
